navGlobalKnightDesc: Be your city’s Web3 engine—link the real world and on-chain civilization with Xone.

navGlobalRecruitmentDesc: Find your place at Xone with them.
navGlobalRecruDetailTitle: Fuel Xone’s next moves and bigger growth
navGlobalRecruDetailDescribe: Everything we do helps Xone serve companies, orgs, and individuals worldwide. If you have ideas and will act on them, join—on Xone’s journey we face challenges without fear.
navGlobalBlogDesc: See the latest Xone updates and history.
navGlobalBlogDetailTitle: Open growth log: turn each iteration into shared assets
navGlobalBlogDetailDescribe: Growth is more than product updates—it’s knowledge and experience. We record design trade-offs, performance tuning, risk & compliance so each post is referenceable, reusable, verifiable.
navGlobalActiveDesc: Meet Xone community members face to face.
navGlobalActiveDetailDescribe: Join events to explore governance & incentives that reshape the digital ecosystem and drive Xone’s sustainable future.
navGlobalGrantsDesc: Spark global developer innovation and grow the ecosystem.
navGlobalGrantsDetailDescribe: Developers are the engine. The XONE Grant Program provides funding, tech support, market resources, and governance access to build quality on-chain apps and infra on Xone.
navOnboardingDesc: See prerequisites to join Xone governance.
navInfluenceDesc: What happens after a proposal passes?

navEcologyBuildDesc: Tour Xone via its ecosystem builds.
subscribeDesc: Xone Chain is a modular Layer-1 that goes beyond scalability and efficiency, ensuring every on-chain action creates tangible, traceable value.
disclaimer: As open infrastructure, Xone lets any global team, developer, or community deploy contracts and build apps without permission—reflecting Web3’s spirit: tech-neutral, transparent, open access. Xone does not “recommend,” “guarantee,” or “endorse cooperation” for any on-chain project. Projects are independently built and operated, bearing their own profit/loss and risks. When joining any project (especially those involving funds), always DYOR—assess carefully and decide rationally.
